title: Requires employers to provide safety ropes and system components to firefighters; repealer
summary: Requires employers to provide safety ropes and system components to firefighters.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring employers to provide safety ropes and system components to firefighters; and to repeal paragraph e of subdivision 1 of section 27-a of such law relating to the definition of "system components"
